org.sercho.masp.space.event
Class UpdateCallEvent<E>

java.lang.Object
  java.util.EventObject
      org.sercho.masp.space.event.SpaceEvent<E>
          org.sercho.masp.space.event.UpdateCallEvent<E>
Type Parameters:
E - type of the entries in the space this event comes from
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public final class UpdateCallEvent<E>
extends SpaceEvent<E>

UpdateCallEvent is fired when the TupleSpace.update(Object, Object) has been called. This event contains both the template and the object used in the call. Note, that the events are created in the EventedSpaceWrapper which thus is their source. Moreover, since the EventedSourceWrapper does not copy the parameters, they may be changed by other threads (which reference them).

Author:
Grzegorz Lehmann
See Also:
EventedTupleSpace, Serialized Form
